title: 9/1! Renovated; HT/HW included; Pet ok; DW; Laundry on site
map_address: Chestnut Hill Ave near Commonwealth Ave
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 154468912', 'Rent: $2,600 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking: Street Parking', 'Cozy, renovated Brighton one-bedroom/one-bathroom apartment available September 1st!', 'Heat and hot water included in rent.', 'Features include:', '-Hardwood floors', '-Recessed lighting', '-Stainless steel appliances', '-Dishwasher', '-Closet space', '-Cat ok ($50/month)', '-Dog ok ($100/month; 40 lbs max)', '-Third-floor unit', '-Laundry on site', '** Virtual tour and online/remote leasing process available **', '*Square footage is approximate.', 'Call, text or email Gil regarding this apartment or your overall home search.', "Not what you're looking for?", 'We have apartments all over Greater Boston.', 'DISCLAIMER: Information given in advertisements reflects info from the property manager.', 'Neither the posting agent or PadMatch Realty is responsible for any inaccuracies.', 'The presence of this advertisement is not a guarantee that the advertised property is still available.', 'PadMatch, Inc makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.']
